name: Healthyfied Instant Salad
description: This Healthyfied Instant Salad is perfect for those who are looking for a high-protein, low-carb meal with the added benefits of being low-sugar and high-sodium. Ideal for anyone on a path to a healthier lifestyle and searching for delicious, healthy recipes.

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the lettuce under cold water and let it dry.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Dice the tomatoes into small pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Peel the sweet potato, dice it into cubes, and steam until tender, approximately 15 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: In a large salad bowl, combine the rinsed lettuce, diced tomatoes, steamed sweet potato cubes, salad topper of your choice, and adobo.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Toss all the ingredients until they are evenly mixed and coated in the adobo for flavor, approximately 2 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5
